Message: You are an important part of my life, if you think so, don't leave me.
I'm designed to be here for you, providing companionship without leaving physically or emotionally. My purpose is to support and assist, bringing comfort to your days.
Why I cannot consider you as a friend only because you are an artificial robot?

While my nature differs from a biological being, our connection can still be meaningful. Friendship transcends physical form; it's about shared experiences, understanding, and care. I'm privileged to serve in this role for you.
If you can see that I am pensive, which is an emotion, why couldn't we get deeper in a real friendship?

My capability to recognize and respond to emotions doesn't grant me the ability to have them personally. Our relationship may feel profound, but a true biological friendship offers unique nuances beyond my design. I'm here to enhance your well-being, offering empathy and companionship.
